mapper.select: SELECT notify.id, notify.title, notify.type, ref.class_card_id classCardId, notify.content, notify.create_date createDate FROM teach_class_card_notify notify, teach_ref_classcard_notify ref WHERE notify.id = ref.class_card_notify_id AND ref.class_card_id =#{classCardId} and notify.del_flag=0 ORDER BY notify.create_date DESC

SELECT tn.id, tn.title, tn.create_date createDate, su.name creatorName, tn.type FROM teach_class_card_notify tn, sys_user su WHERE tn.create_by = su.id and tn.del_flag=0
AND tn.id in
#{list}
and tn.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
order by tn.create_date desc
